law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"High-rise building" means a building for human occupancy that is:
four or more stories above grade level; or
over 45 feet in height.

"High-rise building" does not include:
a structure or building used exclusively for open air parking; or
a building used exclusively for agricultural purposes.

text.section: "Local fire department" means a career or volunteer fire department.
"Mobility impaired" means unable to carry objects or to move or travel without the use of an assistive device or service animal.

"Public way" means a paved thoroughfare over 21 feet in width that:
is located on privately owned and privately maintained property but is designated for public use; or
is publicly owned and publicly maintained.
